column5: I have the rig, can anyone explain to me how these work?  or link me to a website to see how it works?  What kind of bait to use for it, in Geogian bay for Salmon.  I am fishing Meaford and Owen Sound.  Thanks for your help.
Guessing this is the rig you mean.......  cut bait rig  Some info on how to use/rig...  How to   I don't fish Georgian Bay but maybe some one else can chime in.  Good Luck!
